show_name: BBK/BRNK: The Gentle Giants of the Galaxy (TV)
other_title: BUBUKI/BURANKI The Gentle Giants of the Galaxy
ブブキ・ブランキ 星の巨人 (Japanese)
plot: In the world of BBK/BRNK, It's been ten years since Azuma Kazuki has been in Japan, and upon his arrival he is taken prisoner by a group of armed men. Azuma is saved by his childhood friend, Kogane Asabuki, thanks to a living weapon she wields on her right hand, known as a Bubuki. Learning about these weapons, Azuma becomes a Bubuki wielder himself and sets out on a journey.
opening_theme: "Reirō taru Junketsu wa 'Kōen' no Kairai o Hayarase, Gyōten ni Kirameku Akashi o Kizamu" by Megumi Han
